description:
Yamada is the cutest girl in the whole school, and she wants to have her way with 100 different boys before the final bell rings. There’s just one problem: she’s never even been kissed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boy Meets Girl Anata no "Hajimete" Watashi ni Choudai!! / Houkago Daisakusen! Toriaezu Kiss Shimasho?
Boy Meets Girl Voglio essere la"Prima"!! - Strategia del Dopo-Scuola! Cominciamo con un bacio?
Boy Meets Girl. Let Me Have Your "First Time"! - Big Gambit After School! Why Don`t We Start With a Kiss?
ぼーい♂みーつ♀がーる あなたの『初めて』私にちょうだい!! / 放課後大作戦! とりあえずキスしましょ?
